website_summaries.verdict: An affordable brand that's easy to use for beginners.
pros: The Jergens mousse dries fast,  taking just 1-2 min
It's also one of the more affordable options
If you've never used a self-tanning mousse before, this is a solid place to start
Available in both light and deep bronze, this product gives a subtle and natural-looking tan
You will look sun-kissed without any drastic change

customer_reviews.title: ... self tanner for a while but I am so glad that I tried this
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to use a self tanner for a while but I am so glad that I tried this! I have been telling all of my friends to buy it. The color is very natural and subtle but looks really good and lasts. I will put one layer on and wait about 5 minutes to do another layer. Be careful to not leave streaks though because they will last for at least a few days. The product is very easy to apply (I bought tanning gloves). This is a great product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Wong

customer_reviews.title: Good for Vitiligo
customer_reviews.text: I have vitiligo and this is great to help my white areas blend more with the rest of my skin in the summer. I like that it gives immediate color and then darkens over time. It takes a little finesse to apply for vitiligo. There is a bit of a learning curve but can be scrubbed off if you goof up too badly. I use a makeup brush to apply it in smaller areas.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today, and used it instantly! It does have a bronze color to it while adding which makes application easier, to help you know where you put it and where you didn’t. I don’t have a mitt to apply but I just washed my hands after and didn’t have any color left on my hands. I just tried it on my legs and I instantly noticed a difference, and It gradually increases with color as time goes by. Definitely recommend. It’s the perfect texture as well, it isn’t super watery, very easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie statz

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for my first self tanning experience. I think exfoliating really well, lotioning rough areas first, and using a tanning glove really helped this work nicely. Im still learning how to get It completely even, but overall it made my very white skin get a soft summer glow for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was so scared to use a self tanner. They smell, I miss spots, they make you look orange, etc. This product is none of that. Because of COVID and being stuck at home I decided to try it because if it did not work out at least I wouldn’t be seen by anyone! I am not fair but I am light skinned. I WOULD ONLY USE with a self tanning mitt to apply it. I purchased through Amazon the bronze velvet self tanning mitt for $6. The Mitt is the key to application! Worth every penny. Helps spread it evenly on your skin so you have an even tan and not spots that are darker than others.

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD! I seriously recommend...
customer_reviews.text: This product is all I've ever wanted. It absorbs in just a few seconds, it doesn't smell unpleasant, and it leaves a very nice and even natural bronze color on my pale skin . Using a tanning mitt, I applied the foam after shaving, exfoliating, and moisturizing a few minutes before, and the results were amazing after just a few minutes! It dries quickly, leaves ZERO streaks, and the color lasts a few days. I really recommend this product, as it has been one of the best I've tried from Jergens so far.
customer_reviews.author: S.M. 199X

customer_reviews.title: No streaking, natural looking tan.
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a sunless tanner, always afraid of being orange or streaking. This was a great first experience and I'll continue to use this product. My skin is pretty fair- I usually buy foundation labeled light/medium. I followed all recommendations on this page prior to application (shower, exfoliate, dont shave wear gloves, wash hands immediately after, go light on elbows, knees, knuckles) and it turned out fantastic! It developed over night, results were not instant. I actually wasnt planning on taking a comparison photo, but accidentally forgot to do below the knee on one leg lol. Here are my results.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Plymale

customer_reviews.title: Poor Package Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I like this product, but it's the second time the package has been messed up. The first time, I was literally given just the cap, not even the actual bottle of what I ordered. This time, I received the bottle and no cap which left the package sticky and with the product all over it, so much so that you can see it leaking through the outside of the package!! Come on! It's not worth the amount I paid knowing that a bunch of it has now been wasted. I tried to give this seller a second chance but this is getting ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Fougerousse

customer_reviews.title: Can be splotchy but good for last minute event tan!
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for last minute tanning before an event...after a couple days (and not keeping up with a routine of applying) it was extremely splotchy. I wear an Apple Watch and you could totally tell when I took it off. There was a distinct line between where my watch ends and where it starts. I also have some stretch marks (chest area and thighs) and it gravitated towards those areas which made it look awful. Places that were super visible such as inside elbows and my feet where I wore socks faced super quick as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Mix with body lotion and voila!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. The best routine is to exfoliate and shave then mix this with equal parts body lotion and spread in circular motion. Way less streaky that way. You can build color over a few days.
customer_reviews.author: F. Otero

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff. It is easy to rub on and be meticulous when doing so, even though it dries pretty quickly. It seems to last awhile on as well. I only wish there were gloves to wear for applying. I wash my hands immediately and they are left slightly orange. I only do small parts of my body at a time (like lower legs, up legs, etc) because I'm afraid to keep it on my hands any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J. Thorstenson

customer_reviews.title: Overall Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Husband's exact words "You don't look like a Cullen anymore" and "I can't tell that it's a fake tan, it looks natural". It was very easy to apply. I don't love the smell but that's with all self tanners I have ever tried. I will keep using for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rouse

customer_reviews.title: the color comes out evenly and a great color for me and I am typically fair skinned
customer_reviews.text: works really well for me. I can use it the day of when I need it or apply it the night before. If used correctly, the color comes out evenly and a great color for me and I am typically fair skinned. I use it even after being in the sun to appear even more tanned. Just beware with summer being here, sweating can make it come off after initial application (same day) Once I have showered though, it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pros: It makes you tan It lasts,
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It makes you tan It lasts, even if you shower and wash your body It dries quickly (so you can sit on your white bedspread) Cons It leaves your hands orange - BUT you can just use exfoliating soap to remove it from your hands (i use sandstone from lush) If you use too much it will make you orange Be careful to rub in everywhere while its still wet to avoid blank patches
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Good for your budget
customer_reviews.text: I have a love hate relationship with this product. Very cheap which is a plus in my books but it makes my face break out multiple times. I’m very pasty pale red head & I get the mild tone, it works very well does not make me orange. I workout every day and it will last a week. I apply this with a mitten and it’s even. I’ve tried other ways and it comes out streaky, but I wouldn’t blame the product. Good if you are on a budget wouldn’t put it on my face again.
customer_reviews.author: mary malota

customer_reviews.title: Use with a mit
customer_reviews.text: Definitely use with a mit. First time I used this was with a pair of latex gloves. The color was good. A little streaky near my wrists and ankles. It was a little sticky even several hours after application and the smell was pretty strong. I couldn't wait to wash it off in the morning. The second time I used a mit. Much easier to apply and went on very smooth. It also was less sticky. I made sure to exfoliate in the shower and use lotion on elbows, knees, feet and wrists before and after application. I like that it has instant color so you can see where you've applied it and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Subtle difference but I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sun lover but I'd rather look pale than get skin cancer and wrinkles. I had used Jergens lotion in the past and I hated the smell. This product is smells good and it makes my skin soft. I wish it came with a mitten to apply the product. I used my hand and washed it after every area I applied the product. I'll buy a mitten for future use. Don't forget to exfoliate and moisturize!
customer_reviews.author: The Allen Family

customer_reviews.title: Not mousse, pure liquid
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this item because it was mousse, as I haven't had luck with lotions in the past. It is completely liquid. I did extra pumps to see if it was just the beginning that was liquid, but it was all just brownish orange liquid. Big disappointment! UPDATE! I scratched my leg more than 24 hours after I used this yesterday and this is how I look now. It WAS even on that part of my leg. Holy cow! How long till this wears off?
customer_reviews.author: GirlMomB

customer_reviews.title: Try it! You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many sunless tanning products and this is the best! It spreads easily with VERY minimal streaking. The color is very natural looking- I purchased the light bronze because I have fairly light skin tone with pink-neutral undertones. A lot of tanners have too much orange tone, but this is the most naturally toned for my skin. I can always count on my mom and sister’s honest opinion and they were impressed with the color and coverage that I was able to achieve with only one application. My sister said that it looked better than her high-end product. It lasts a few days and does not do that shedding/scaling thing that I’ve experienced in the past with others.
customer_reviews.author: C.Grow

customer_reviews.title: Only self tanner I'll ever use
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different self tanners and this one is my favorite BY FAR. The foam really works much better than any lotion or spray. Even distribution, barely any streaking (what there was, was my fault). Wonderful color as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsta Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy newbie
customer_reviews.text: First time using self tanner, mostly out of pandemic boredom. Ordered this after reading TONS of reviews on TONS of brands. I went with the lighter option. I also opted to buy applicators/gloves separately to make things easier. Carefully read the instructions, exfoliated and applied. Have to say, a lot easier than I thought it would be. Color was perfect for me, not too dark (I was my usual pasty winter white before applying) but not too light. Went on evenly, but I was very careful about this. Overall very satisfied. Will definitely be purchasing more as I try to limit my exposure so direct sun (family history of skin cancer and I have melasma-dark spots caused by sun)
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Eehhh there are better. Very little color change noticeable.
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh... I’m very pale and I used on one arm to compare...you can tell a very faint difference but for me not enough. I will try again whole body and reapply next day as they advise to see if different. I also bought dark bronzer but didn’t try yet. Also made me feel a little sticky like. Personally I’m still HUGE fan of neutrogenia spray tanner but it’s not immediate (like minutes) but within 1-3 hours it’s apparent.
customer_reviews.author: H. N. Lombard

customer_reviews.title: works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product for the price. The smell isn't horrible, there is going to be a scent but it's definitely not as bad as when I get spray tans. I would recommend doing one layer to see the color it gives you and build up day by day instead of multiple layers in one session. I used a mitt to apply the product and it looked even and drys pretty quickly. I definitely will be ordering this product again when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: emily ruzhitsky

customer_reviews.title: its good, but I still noticed that it streaked a ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a deep bronze color. I have a very pale skin tone. I barely noticed a difference with just one coat. It just looked like I was out in the sun for a few hours. It took two-three coats to look more tan. the smell isn't bad at all and it dries quickly, and it's a good price compared to all the higher priced ones out there. But I'm not all that impressed. I will probably just pay more money for the ones that give me a darker tan look.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse DNice

customer_reviews.title: Only good for one day... not good enough!
customer_reviews.text: Just prior to an event, I used this the day of. I was skeptical but proceeded. Looked pretty good that day. The 2nd day, ok. But by day 3.... I looked like I had a skin disorder. Others tanners i have used in the past usually wear off, gradually fading away. But this one!!!!! It wore off in patches, splotches. Would not recommend. Much prefer the Jergens lotion although the results are not as dramatic. I actually prefer Fake Bake over all but was looking for a product less expensive. Going back to that and with all self tanning products, wear a mitten type glove to smooth out.
customer_reviews.author: JHM

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I am as white as a white girl can get (redhair, blue eyes). I wanted some color and I always burn so went looking and thought I would try this. It worked great. I apply a little each day to keep the color where I like it. No streaks. It doesn't moisturize but I wasn't expecting that. Great natural color.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bogan

customer_reviews.title: I know self tanner
customer_reviews.text: I am queen of the self tanner, I know self tanner lol seriously, I used to use Bare Minerals self tanner until they decided to discontinue it, and I searched for something that would be as good and I found it. I absolutely love love love this self tanner. It’s not sloppy or drippy it holds and goes on smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Jenny

customer_reviews.title: use gloves
customer_reviews.text: I've used this before so I knew what I was getting into from the get-go. I suggest moisturizing a few minutes prior to applying this bronzer. Also, use rubber gloves. The bronzer will stain your hands and may not completely be able to be washed off completely. It does go on easily and smoothly with gloves, and you can peel them off turning them inside out when done. Yes, it works. No, you don't get orange. Start sparingly and allow some time to see how much your skin changes, and then adjust from there if you like the depth of color or want a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pale and in the summer months, it makes me a bit self conscious. I’ve tried EVERY sunless tan product out there and have spent hundreds if not thousands of dollars getting spray tans in my life. I promise you, try this product and you will not be disappointed. It’s so incredibly easy to use, truly a streak-free application and you can instantly see color on your skin unlike others that take time to develop. Apply this at night and allow it to dry, come morning time you will have a gorgeous, lifelike tan.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other self tanners
customer_reviews.text: After just one application, this mousse created a noticeable tan on my otherwise very pale complexion. That's more than I can say for other self tanners I've tried (both mists and lotions). As with any self tanner, you need to exfoliate/cleanse the skin first and take extra care around your elbows, knees and ankles. With proper application you'll see great results!
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: To Light
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize these were travel size😕 Also wanted the deep bronze! Have to apply 2 to 3 coats for desired color☹️ To much agh if it was deep an not light this would have been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Slim6

customer_reviews.title: Mess! Mess! Mess!
customer_reviews.text: This was just a horrible, embarrassing mess. Even if you don’t use that much, you’ll leave a tan mess everywhere you go! When I woke up the next day, my white sheets were ruined and going to work was embarrassing because it was totally uneven, even when I used the mitt! Save yourself the trouble, avoid it!
customer_reviews.author: 🌙Katrina🌙

customer_reviews.title: Natural tan.  Lots of effort.
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. It’s sticky. Very easy to apply. The color comes out nice. I bought this because of the great reviews. I usually use the Jergens Natural Glow Lotion and that is so easy to use compared to this. This stains your hands. JNG never stains hands, fingers, toes etc. I guess I just don’t want to spend 7 min applying self tanner when I can do it in 2 and get the same result. Actually, JNG isn’t sticky, but both give you a beautiful natural tan.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rae

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Actually really impressed with this stuff. It gives me a really light, natural bronze glow with just 1 application, applied with a hand mitt I didn't notice any streaking either. The thing I like most is that the scent is not strong and overpowering like most other sunless tanners I have used. It's very subtle and fades away as it dries. I do feel like it takes a few minutes to fully dry, not 60 seconds as it claims, but that's OK. So far this is my favorite tanner on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING GLOW!
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to sweat out in the sun so tanning is just a no for me. But I hate being pale, this product will now forever be in my cabinet! I loved the glow it gave me. I suggest definitely wear gloves I just use basic disposable ones. Also make sure you are hair free and exfoliated it helps with application. It does dry pretty fast so The first time using don’t go overboard because with time it gets darker. The directions do say if you want a deeper tan to reapply the next day! FOLLOW THOSE INSTRUCTIONS so you don’t over do it.
customer_reviews.author: Madisan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING this is after one use.
customer_reviews.text: This is one layer. I never wrote reviews, but this one I had to. In the past year I have tried many different tanning lotions and sprays to find one that fit me best. When I got this I had high hopes. I had never used a foam one that was inexpensive. However, this one is the holy Grail. As soon as I used this I did not smell an odor. The foam spread so easily. I have 0 complaints. For the price of this you can't beat it. I have never wanted to spend over 20 and this is under 10! This will now be my go to tanner. Do not hesitate. It is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An okay product
customer_reviews.text: This works well but it does have some problems. It doesn't really set in the skin as well as I'd like and as a result I have some staining on my clothes and it's done this weird thing where it's rubbed off at places where my clothes end, like the hem of my shorts shown in photo. It's a little difficult spread with your hands. It stains fingernails. It does add a nice glow. I bought it to try to even out tan lines. Not much luck there but still, an okay product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, doesn't streak
customer_reviews.text: I have found this tanning lotion to work really well. It doesn't streak or leave darker areas than others. The scent is fine for a while, but then after a while, it has the same scent as all other tanning lotions (if you've used others before, you'll know the scent i'm talking about). It's not a bad scent, just the usual scent. I have found this product to take about an hour to really soak in and start giving a natural, tanned look. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alyandoly

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the famous St. Tropez!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is way better than any high-end self tanner I’ve used and I’m saving major money by choosing this product. I’m pasty white and actually glow in the dark. I use the light to medium shade and it gives me a natural, bronzed look. I like to put self-tanner on when I go to sleep, so I have noticed that it does get on my sheets. But, it comes out with a simple wash. The scent is tropical, but it starts to smell in the morning - when I reach hour 8 or 9. The color guide is nice and it usually dries for me in about 5-10 minutes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Not orange. Buildable. Moisturizing. Easy to apply. Natural looking. Nothing bad to say about it. It dries so fast! I don’t have to wait long at all! And it’s not sticky like a lot of people say! Maybe a tiny bit but it doesn’t interfere with anything and doesn’t transfer to clothes! Will always buy this! It’s so convenient. Even being on vacation, just apply after a shower and it literally dries in one minute. And done! So amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING product
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a friend and let me tell you - it is the best $11 you'll spend. Not only does it look natural but the tan lasts for days! I truly have not felt this comfortable in my skin in a while. I found that putting it on with a mit does help, but you can also do it with your hands (it just makes your nails look nasty). Doesn't rub off on sheets at all. Seriously couldn't recommend this product more!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Probably won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: The consistency was not what I was expecting. Came out very watery. I also bought a darker shade but did not see much difference. Stained hands but typically easy to wash off. I enjoy other Jurgens products so I’ll probably stick with those instead
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tenca

customer_reviews.title: Finally a perfect tan and glow for pale complexions.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tanner. I'm very light skinned and this tanner dries quickly without being orange. I reapply once a week. If I use two applications a day apart - it will be orangey - BUT only one application per week gives me exactly the tan I was looking for, Quality product and glides on easily. I use a microfiber mitt to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Charshet

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I usually hate tanners because no matter what they say, they smell awful! Not this guy! He's the best! Upon recommendations of other reviewers, I purchased a mitten type thing to apply it. This stuff is amazing! I love the mousse texture. It goes on so smoothly! It gives a natural tan look that isn't too dark and not streaky at all. One of the best things is that it fades and doesn't leave weird dots and marks as it's fading, like others I've tried. This is one I will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Willet

customer_reviews.title: Great color, no scent or streaks!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you buy a mitt- otherwise could not recommend this product more highly. I got a ton of compliments on my tan after using this product. I used once a week and followed up with a Jergens moisturizer to maintain color. Light bronze is great for fair skinned ladies looking to get a sun kissed look without the sun damage! Just make sure to exfoliate regularly when using or you will start to see patchiness.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is how long it lasts, I feel like it fades quickly and you have to apply more frequently, if you use to much it builds up and flakes off. I’m a huge fan of using this with the lotion together (not at the same time) natural looking and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Kay

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunless tanner
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite sunless tanner. In my years of searching for a good sunless tanner that's affordable and doesn't look like you rolled around on a pile of cheetos, this has been the best by far. It spreads very nicely. It has a certain smell to it but nothing too bad. For my fair skin the medium bronze one is perfect, looks pretty much like a real tan. Of course remember to wash your hands very thoroughly or better yet use a mitt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s great... but
customer_reviews.text: Pros 1) foam.. easy to apply and doesn’t feel greasy and thick 2) quick dry.. I usually apply right before bed, and I only wait bout five minutes before slipping under the covers, and it’s never stained my sheets 3) natural look.. unlike other self tanners, this one never turns me orange Cons 1) doesn’t last long.. maybe lasts about 5 days tops, then becomes slightly splotchy and faded 2) no pools.. I noticed in treated pools that it takes off the “tan” almost completely, not in a noticeable orange slick floating on top of the water way lol, but you’ll see the “tan” is faded when you dry off
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Read me
customer_reviews.text: It works!!! I purchased this in “Light Bronze” and I’m happy I did because it is a very bronze shade. I also used a Tanning Mitten to apply it. I do HIGHLY recommend doing that. The product itself it’s a foam that you spread out. It does stink like any self tanning spray lol Great for the price! I work 5 days a week and hardly ever get the chance to enjoy the sun so this was much needed!
customer_reviews.author: amorrrda

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used tanner before but after a few rounds with this I feel like a pro! It's really easy and gives a great tan. You are only sticky for a few minutes after application, then after that I forget I even put it on. And although it says it is not for the face, I put a light layer on my face with no problem. People tell me I've been getting some sun when in reality it's all this Jergens! Now my whole girl gang is on board with this foam.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Hauritz

customer_reviews.title: Why it’s my Favorite Self-Tanner: Low Price, Foam
customer_reviews.text: My favorite self-tanner be far! Best price On Amazon!! I can make a bottle last 3-4 weeks. The foam makes it easy to apply and spread evenly. I bought a mitten to apply (sold separately), which makes it even easier to apply myself. Love the natural tan tint — no more orange! Just make sure to wash your hands after applying (or put lotion on them before applying). Even with
customer_reviews.author: Allison Varnell

customer_reviews.title: Bridesmaids Ready
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with the overall color that came from this tanner. Not thrilled on how easy it is to wash off but I guess it isn't a real tan. You have to be very sparing on your hands, feet, elbows and oddly enough I found out inner thighs. If your thighs rub together even after allowing to dry overnight the product will "bunch" together around the areas that touch and create a darker looking area.
customer_reviews.author: Sirena

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner I’ve used! Realistic color!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self tanner I have ever used. It looks SO real. Even my dermatologist commented that I must have been out in the sun. It’s not orange at all and almost has a slight pink tint to it. I’m very fair and burn easily so a good self tanner is a must. It’s easy to apply, but it does stain hands easily so wash your hands well with soap afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It shows color right away. I'm very happy with the color and it's very easy to apply. I used plastic gloves to apply it and I didn't have to worry about the discoloration on my hands. You can't put too many layers on though, it will begin to look a little orange if you apply too many, but about 3 has been good for me and my skin tone. The color only last 2-3 washes, so will need to reapply every few days to keep the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. My legs were so smooth after putting this on and they stayed smooth. It didn’t get everywhere. It drys in seconds. The next day it was darker from certain angles it did have a yellow tint here and there but it looked good all in all. I am super white so that’s bound to happen! I would still use it again. I only used it once so far with one application. It lasted a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Katzaman

customer_reviews.title: Fake!!
customer_reviews.text: FAKE PRODUCT! I finished up a bottle of the same jergens mousse from walmart on my legs before opening up this one from amazon and it came out a COMPLETELY different color, it was a pale yellow color compared to the usual brown color of my store bought. And it dried that way too. Another thing I have to return now. Basically every beauty product on amazon is a fake. You would think a million dollar company (amazon) would regulate who they allow as manufactures and make sure they're selling LEGITIMATE products.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie bennett

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: I feel this doesn’t spread well, even with using a tanning mitt and exfoliating well compared to other products I’ve used. The color also isn’t as nice as some other brands I’ve used, I feel a little more of an orange hue comes off when the tan sets in. This will transfer onto your clothes and sheets, I’ve already ruined a few pillow cases from the tan rubbing off
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Years of different tanning products, tanning beds, salon spray tans and this is my favorites. It’s foamy, so it’s easy to apply evenly. Natural looking color, dark but not orange. A very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CC Conboy

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable glow.
customer_reviews.text: This gives a nice natural looking tan. I have fair skin so I was afraid to try self-tanner and it looking fake and orange. This gives a nice light bronze glow. It's very easy to apply and blend. However, it does dry quickly so you need to make sure you blend quickly. The only downside to this product is the small. I notice a biscuit smell later in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Best tanner for your money
customer_reviews.text: I've tried tons on self tanner. This applies evenly with a mitt every time. I usually sleep with it and rinse in the morning. Perfect summer glow. I have the best luck when I apply 2 days in a row. I always go back to this one .
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice but smells like henna
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you my story with this product .. it’s funny. I was goin. On a date and I was wearing short dress. So I used it on my legs. I didn’t use a glove so my hand turned orange 😅 anyway the result was nice and I was happy with my legs. My date sakes that my hands smell like Henna and it was true. This product has a henna smell! However as I checked ingredients I didn’t find any henna maybe they used the active substance or something like that. I’d recommend this product.. but use a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Bash khouja

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ORANGE, ORANGE, ORANGE!!! I am fair skinned and it didn't do me justice!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline A. Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first (and only) self-tanner to try. I wanted to give up tanning beds and this stuff has been perfect. I exfoliate, shave, and then apply it with a tanning mitt. I’ve yet to see streaks even as a newbie to self-tanning. The color lasts almost a whole week for me.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Bottle damaged, half full, waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Box was fine but product was spilled out in the container and when you pump it it just squirts our the sides. I can’t even use this. Not to mention this body is only half full compared to the one I bought at Walmart in a different shade. Extremely disappointed in this product. It will be going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blends perfectly for me!
customer_reviews.text: Easy with a mitt, no smears and literally a perfect blend with my skin tone. I am pale and applied twice over 12 hours and I love my color! Not drastic and no streaks! Will def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: jvaclavik

customer_reviews.title: gloweeeeee
customer_reviews.text: I am literally obsessed. I use about once a week to give me a bit of a glow - I definitely always exfoliate before using or it starts to get a bit patchy. I also always use a glove. Some of the other (more expensive) self tanners have turned me orange or layered at my ankles or knees, and this one does not do that. I definitely feel "bronzed" 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT use on face!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing and affordable! It lays on very evenly and leaves skin soft and glowy. The only downside is when applying on the face it clogs the pores and looks very patchy and yellow. I'm sure it is not meant to be applied on face in the first place, but just to make sure you have good results do NOT apply on the face. Otherwise, this is GOOD stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: No streaks!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I would have given 5 stars but the smell after a couple hours is not the best. It's not as strong as some other self tanners I have tried but it still has a smell. I am very pale and this gave me the perfect natural glow. I have used it 2x in 4 days and love the color. Not streaky and natural looking. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not orange - not intended for a dark tan look
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use of you want the look of a deep dark tan because that’s not what self tanners are for. Self tanning is to enhance the natural color of your complexion. I’m very pale and burn in the sun-no natural tan here. I use a mitt for application and it doesn’t look orange. Just use a little bit and it provides a nice tint. I’ve used Jergens for years and they don’t disappoint provided you apply it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: 100th

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I used gloves to apply all over & as long as you keep your hands moving & really work it in, you wont have streaking. I learned the hard way to heed the instructions- EXFOLIATE! That's this buyer's problem, not a fault of the product. I will definitely buy again & I've recommended it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci Walley

customer_reviews.title: Great Color
customer_reviews.text: Less tacky than Loreal or Neutrogena!!! This is a winner in my book. Will stain hands though quickly, apply lotion to palms, knees, elbows and feet ect before beginning application to discourage staining to rough skin areas. Overall, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Don Miller

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: Maybe its my skin, i am fair skin and put a lot on and got no color whatsoever. I may try the dark bronze but im nervous to waste my money again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This works well as a foam. I wouldn’t put it on in the morning though. It’ll bleed onto clothing. I typically do a sugar scrub over my whole body and apply it an hour before I go to bed. Wait 10-15 minutes for it to be completely dry before putting loose clothing on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Product
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this product and encouraged by many of the reviews, but unfortunately I think the product I received was faulty. The foam itself seems to be a lighter color than previewed by the review pictures and I have applied four days in a row and am seeing no color change. Very disappointing, given I have been a long-term customer of Jergens products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice natural look
customer_reviews.text: Nice tint with first layer. I wore this stuff on my legs only during my vacay in Orlando 2019. I went to discovery bay and was in the water it never streaked if it did come off. For the most part It stayed lol. i would wear it again. Goes on evenly if legs are moisturized
customer_reviews.author: janessa

customer_reviews.title: No tan happened at all
customer_reviews.text: Used it all over my body and literally nothing happened. I was worried about looking like a fake tan but no tan happened. Waste of money. Not sure what happened but totally worthless. I had the fair to medium one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Cook

customer_reviews.title: So much better then St. Tropez that was 3 times more in price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during the quarantine and was happy with it but when things opened back up I purchased a more expensive self tan from Sephora. It wasn’t until I used this more expensive tanner that I realized how great Jergens is. It goes on much better, is more tan and less dirty looking and the smell is so much better for so much less. I would highly recommend. It does what it says and is such a bargain compared to high end tanners that do not go on as well as this one does.
customer_reviews.author: allie30

customer_reviews.title: It works! But prepare to get messy
customer_reviews.text: This product works! Even after one coat, I could definitely spot the difference. It has a nice natural tone and did not make me look orange. I do highly recommend getting a tanning glove to apply the lotion as it is difficult to do with bare hands. My first time putting it on, my hands were completely orange by the time I was done. It took a lot of scrubbing, soap, and hot water but it came off. I guess that means it works well! I was also able to get quite a few uses out of the bottle as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Bloomquist

customer_reviews.title: Natural, quick, color
customer_reviews.text: I’m white. I’m WHITE, white. I’m practically translucent. I put mayonnaise on things. I think Tabasco is spicy. I am WHITE y’all. (I got the light bronze) So I used this product and it worked quite well. I didn’t use any “primer” that the company sells and this is how it looks. (See picture) The left leg has two coats of the foam and the right leg has nothing on it. I took the picture in natural light as well. The product didnt make a HUGE difference but it does look natural (which is what you want when tanning). I’ll try a second coat tomorrow to see how it looks and hopefully post an update photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought so many expensive tanning products. I just tried this one and it’s honestly so much better than the high end products. I’m actually a little bitter I’ve been buying the pricey stuff all this time. It builds so evenly and doesn’t rub off. If you apply with a mit, I promise you it’ll be worth far more than the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W.

customer_reviews.title: easy to apply and looks natural
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! as someone who has been described as “translucent” and “glow-in-the-dark pale” this product worked great for me. it was easy to apply (with a mitt) and didn’t have that really strong tanned smell. it’s not orange at all and looks really natural. the only problem i encountered was when i went to put on another layer after about a week. after i showered and exfoliated, it looked like the first layer had scrubbed off in some parts so when i put the second layer on it was patchy. just make sure to either scrub it all off or don’t scrub too hard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect subtle glow!
customer_reviews.text: Love this color! I got the light bronze color and I’m super happy! First pic is before / second is after. It’s a lighter bronze so it’s a subtle glow. This will be my go-to for SURE. I’ll try the darker color soon. Definitely use with a tanning mit and you won’t get streaks.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L Barett

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self-tanner I have ever tried and I feel like I have tried them all. I have tried expensive ones and inexpensive ones. This is, BY FAR, the best. It gives an instant color but doesn’t fully set until an hour or two after application. I will definitely be buying more! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jami J.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you use a mitt!
customer_reviews.text: It goes on evenly and gave me a nice glow! Defiantly recommend using a mitt applicator. I used the light bronze and waited a day to reapply. I’ll go with medium next time but I wasn’t sure how dark it would look, so I figured I could add more to get the look I wanted. Worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B

customer_reviews.title: I’m “natural ivory” and this was too LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews before I got this, I knew it was LIGHT. But I thought that was ok since I am PALE. Like my foundation color is “natural ivory”. But this tanner didn’t work at all because it’s so light.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Mae

customer_reviews.title: My go to lotion!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to product for a quick tan. I love that it is easy to spread on your skin and after just a short time gives a warm glow. A lot of reviews say that it has a good scent. It still smells like tanning lotion to me just not as strong.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works really well if applied evenly
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I’m super impressed by this. I first put lotion on all over then applied this with a washcloth to get a more even color and now about 5 hours later, it looks awesome. It looks like i went for a spray tan for half the price! I’d definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe Hale

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Looks fake. Lasts about 24 hours, although I guess that could be seen as a benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Curtis

customer_reviews.title: For this being a cheaper self tanner, im impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I do my research on every product I buy (online) very carefully. I watched youtube videos on the results and everyone seemed impressed so I just went for it! I got a good application glove set (Very important when self tanning) and exfoliated well a few hours before applying. It gave me an incredible and natural color, I didnt look orange or anything and that was with two solid coats! Very satisfied, it also smelled good.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t really work for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a tan person at all but even when I try to build this up I’m getting hardly any color. It is also difficult to tell where you’ve already applied since it’s so subtle. I’ll keep trying since I doubt I can return it
customer_reviews.author: Robin D.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ever using a self tanner so I got the light bronze. These were my legs after building up two coats. I did one coat and waited 8 hours, washed off and applied another layer and slept in it, and I got wonderful results! It’s not orange it’s exactly what it says it is, bronze. I wish I had gotten the deep bronze. I’m the type of person who can’t tan so i’m glad i tried this out :)
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I have been using this for about 4 years now, it’s very affordable and great quality, does not make my skin orange at all!! A must buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply because you can see where it goes
customer_reviews.text: Some bloggers have called this the holy grail of sunless tanners and I agree. No offensive smell. Easy to apply because you can see where it goes. And, once you give it a minute or two to dry, it doesn't rub off at all on clothes, towels, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jordanmj

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve tried a self tanner and I absolutely love it. I’m a very pale almost paper white normally and I got the lightest color it’s perfect. Looks so real. Gives a very nice tint without looking orange. Addicted to this stuff
customer_reviews.author: StephRF

customer_reviews.title: Really good; don't have to spend time in the sun for a glow.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! Tip for use, when the GLOW has had time to set after self application and you can see where ya had excess or maybe some streaking, typically the next day. I used an eye make up remover pad to blend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product one time and it will be my go to from now on. I have tried so many self-tanning products and this is the first one that works for me. No weird smell, and easy application; best of all it looks like a tan, and not an orange mess.
customer_reviews.author: Gene C

customer_reviews.title: Love! Just upset it spilled out in the shipment:(
customer_reviews.text: loved the product itself. Definitely one of the best self tanners I've ever used and for the price! I'll definitely be using again. However most of it spilled out somehow in the package. So that was a super bummer. Just thankful it didn't ruin anything else in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna V

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Gives a little "sun". Not too dark, can add more next day. Careful to apply evenly. Gradually fades over a few days. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: countrygal

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanning lotion on the market
customer_reviews.text: I am a natural blonde senior with really fair skin and have pretty much given up sun worshipping. I have tried many self tanning lotions with unsatisfactory results. This Jergens is the best I’ve ever used-doesn’t streak and makes your skin just dark enough to give you a healthy glow. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alberta Doochin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty satisfied with the color and staying power!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t experience most of the negative reviews, I ordered light bronze, applied two layers with mitt, next day the skin became this natural bronze I think it’s really pretty, I have fair/light skin and it looks pretty good! The only down side if the scent, it smells ok upon the initial application but smells not that good after dried, but after washing the smell goes away
customer_reviews.author: Tessa G

product_meta.title: Jergens 20937 Natural Glow Instant Sun Body Mousse, Light Bronze Tan, 6 Ounce Sunless Tanning, Self Tanner, for a Natural-Looking Tan
product_meta.description: Color:Light BronzeGet a beautiful, sun-drenched tan in just 60 seconds by smoothing on Jergens Natural Glow Instant Sun Sunless Tanning Mousse for Body. This lightweight, airy mousse works with your skin tone to mimic results you’d get from the natural sun, and without the unpleasant sunless tanner odor. The tinted formula lets you see where you’ve applied it, so the result is a precise, even glow that dries in 60 seconds. The color develops instantly, and will continue to develop for several hours after application to a natural-looking shade. If you’d like deeper color, the formula is buildable, and can be applied again the next day. It’s safe, hassle-free color even when the beach is miles (or months) away.
feature_bullets: Flawless self-tanning - Create a flawless tan for gradual, natural-looking color before, or after, the beach.
Instant tanning results - Our airy tanning mousse enhances your natural skin tone to mimic results from the sun.
Mousse formula is tinted so you can see where you’ve applied it, and it allows for precise, even application that dries in just 60 seconds
Customize your color - Develop your tone instantly, and watch it deepen within hours of application for steak-free results. Use the next day for deeper color.
Tropical, fruity scent - Jergens natural glow mousse gives you an island escape with its tropical, fruity fragrance.
Easy, fast-drying application - Applied by hand or sunless tanning mitt, our self-tanning mousse is tinted for precise application, and it dries in just 60 seconds.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
